Title: Object: S. Antonius
Description: St Anthony. Landscape with the saint kneeling in front of a crucifix in lower left corner, a river with a small bridge at centre, hills and houses in background Engraving
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (12) (Sadeler Excudit)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
